title: Did Nostradamus expect the George W. Bush election?
subtitle: The mysterious language, as well as the irony on the Internet, is equal to the "thank you" that may seem legitimate without further investigation.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: In 1555, Nostradamus predicted that December 2000 would see "the idiots of the village will come out to welcome the leader into the house of the greatest power."
